data_sources.description: Contains the salary information of data scientists, including work year, experience level, employment type, job title, salary, salary currency, salary in USD, employee residence, remote ratio, and company location.

data_variables.name: Data_science
data_variables.description: DataFrame containing the salary data for data science positions.

data_variables.name: DS_file_path
data_variables.description: Path to the CSV file containing data science salaries.

data_variables.name: dtypes
data_variables.description: DataFrame containing the data types of each column in the Data_science DataFrame.

data_flow.flow: Used for exploratory data analysis and various plotting functions.
Used to check data types of the features in the dataset.
